fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player at night.
- Determine a player's loyalty. You'll know if they are your target faction. 1 night cooldown.
- During the day, disguise yourself as any role to investigative role tonight. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Piercing** - You bypass all natural defenses, but temporary ones stop you.
- Basic defense autovest, 1 use.
- At the beginning of the game, you are assigned a random REF to eliminate, you know what REF you must take out.
- You cannot act the next night if you kill a Good faction member.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see your target faction be eradicated (you win on their death), or have your target faction lose while having killed half of their members (rounded down, achievable while dead)
